questions.question: Do I need international trade experience to use Exbordia?
questions.answer: No, Exbordia automates the entire process for you. You don't need prior knowledge or export experience.

questions.question: In which countries does Exbordia work?
questions.answer: Exbordia helps you sell in the USA, Canada, LATAM, Europe, and other markets with demand for your product.

questions.question: How long does it take to start selling with Exbordia?
questions.answer: You can start in minutes. Connect it to your store and Exbordia will start working immediately.

questions.question: Do I need technical or coding knowledge to use Exbordia?
questions.answer: No, Exbordia is 100% plug & play. It integrates with your e-commerce without complicated configurations

questions.question: What makes Exbordia different from a marketing agency or consultancy?
questions.answer: Unlike agencies, Exbordia doesn't just advise, it acts in real-time. Thanks to its updated database and global partnerships, Exbordia identifies opportunities, optimizes listings, and manages regulations faster and with greater precision, allowing you to expand without friction.
